titleStmt.title: The conspiracie, and tragedie of Charles Duke of Byron, Marshall of France Acted lately in two playes, at the Black-Friers. Writted by George Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Thomas Thorppe, and are to be sold [by Laurence Lisle] at the Tygers head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is xylographic.
"The tragedie of Charles Duke of Byron" has separate divisional title; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
